image.title: SUMO360 - 3D Scene Understanding and Modeling Blog

item.title: SUMO 2019 Launched
item.description: We are proud to launch the 2019 SUMO challenge today. We are also announcing the associated 2019 SUMO Challenge Workshop, to be held at CVPR. We encourage you to participate in the challenge and join us at the workshop. We also invite researchers to submit short technical papers, which will be presented at the workshop and published in IEEE and on the CVF web site. Read on for the full call for participation.
